statusLine.command: input=$(cat); dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); used=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context_window.used_percentage // "0"'); branch=$(cd "$dir" 2>/dev/null && git -c core.filemode=false config --global --add safe.directory "$dir" 2>/dev/null; git -c core.filemode=false rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD 2>/dev/null || echo 'no git'); git_status=$(cd "$dir" 2>/dev/null && [ "$branch" != "no git" ] && git -c core.filemode=false status --porcelain 2>/dev/null); [ -n "$git_status" ] && branch="$branch *"; printf "\033[34m%s\033[0m | \033[33m%s\033[0m | \033[32m%s\033[0m | \033[35mContext: %s%%\033[0m" "$dir" "$model" "$branch" "$used"
